body.name: Mop Broom Holder Wall Mount Metal Pantry Organization and Storage Garden Kitchen Tool Organizer Wall Hanger for Home Goods (4 Positions with 4 Hooks, Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 6 mins
features: ✔ LIGHTWEIGHT AND DURABLE: Made of technological metal. This high-quality material is super lightweight and extremely durable. NEVER RUST, and guarantees a long service life.

✔ SPACE SAVER: No more messy closet or loose items laying around. Our tool organizer combined with 4 slots and 4 hooks allow you hold various household objects, can be used in the laundry, kitchen, bathroom, utility room, garage, garden and ect. And it's worth to mention that all slots and hooks are movable.

✔ NO-SLIDE GUARANTEE: 4 spring-loaded slots with rubber grips that hold tightly to tool handles to keep them firmly in place. And 4 hangers bear totally up to 40 pounds. You can use this rack to hold everything from brooms & mops to gardening & hardware tools.

✔ ORGANIZE YOUR HOME IN 5 MINUTES: This broom holder wall mounted is perfect for keeping your tools neatly stored, organized, and accessible on the wall, helps to beautify your living spaces and create a cozy environment.

✔ AFTER-SALES SERVICE: Any problems with the mop holder during the use, please contact the seller Holikme in time, the after-sales team will handle your problem as quickly as possible. Just "Add to cart" and buy it now for your convenient life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow I'm amazed
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I have a laundry room and it's not as spacious so basically I have the washing machine and then the dryer and then a little space so every time I walk by the broom the mop the duster you know just whatever you have in the corner would fall down on me and every time you pick it up it was just so annoying so when I came across this I read the reviews and I said well this seems really good the price is right and I saw the video and I said this this would work cuz it's not too big and it holds four things so if you want to do your your vacuum in the little portable one there mine weighs about what 3 lb, plus your broom and the duster and it has three hooks so I put the dustpan which is the one you know you hold and you sweep it into it where the hook is the only problem with that is not with the product the dustpan is not it's a cheap one doesn't fold in but with all that when I walk by I don't hit it it doesn't bother me or if I was to bend and I try to pick up something that falls on the floor it's not in the way so there's three hooks like I said you can hook like the duster on there or if you have like a little scrub brush and I like I said it holds my eureka three and one vacuum it's very very strong it really holds I mean and it's so easy to install too and and for what I paid for it it didn't break the bank and like I said if you have a small area I mean it doesn't take up much space and it just looks much better on the wall up against there not just everything all in one corner falling on you I Am so satisfied with this I'm glad I got it I'm definitely this is a keeper for me so yeah I definitely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working very well so far.
reviews.reviewText: I installed this in our small laundry room to tidy up the mops, brushes etc. that were in there. Previously everything was propped up in a corner and they would fall over and just look untidy. This mount makes everything much neater. It was very easy to install, all mounting hardware is included. I use this for Swiffer mops and brooms, brushes. It's easy to use, everything fits in the mount well without having to force things into it. it seems sturdy and nothing has fallen out. it's been up for a few months with no problems. It comes with hooks that may come in useful too. This was everything I needed at a very good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The Holikme Mop Broom Holder Wall Mount in black is a lifesaver for keeping my home organized.
reviews.reviewText: With its simple installation and durable metal build, it's a functional addition. Four positions and hooks offer versatile storage for cleaning tools, kitchen utensils, and more. Its space-saving design enhances my kitchen and pantry, and retrieving items is effortless. Beyond functionality, the sleek black finish adds a touch of style. Overall, this organizer is a must-have, decluttering my space and making it more efficient. It's a fantastic purchase, highly recommended for its practicality and aesthetic appeal.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great space-saving item!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to hold brooms and the mop at our airbnb. It installed quickly and easily. It is small enough to fit in narrow spaces, but sturdy enough to hold all our cleaning tools. Since my original purchase, I have ordered 2 more for other airbnbs and one for our personal house, where we actually hung our vacuum! Great product at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small design flaw
reviews.reviewText: My previous broom rack required special maneuvering of the broom handle in order to insert it into the fastener. Over time, the push and pull of removing and returning broom handles onto the rack caused the drywall anchors to loosen and then I had a wobbly broom rack. I purchased this rack for my walk in pantry because, unlike my previous one, this one has a raised end on the fasteners that hold the broom handles which makes it easy to manually open the fastener to insert a broom handle. Fast forward to installing this product, it was very easy. I used a power drill to create pilot holes for the drywall anchors and then the drill made screwing the rack to the wall very fast and effortless. The design flaw lies in that this rack is very thin and the fasteners sit very close to the wall. So in my case, I have a Bona mop that has a thick handle and a large container attached to the base and this requires more space between the handle and wall for it to stay securely on the rack. Within 3 minutes of placing the Bona mop on the rack, it slipped off and fell to the floor. I had no issues with my swiffer or my small broom and dustpan. I plan to add a wood base to the wall and then place the rack over it to create more space between the fasteners and the wall. For this reason, I give it 3 stars. Had the fasteners sat further from the wall, I would have no issues with it and would have given it 5 stars.
The product received is quality wise good and useful
what more is needed to be said

reviews.reviewTitle: Most secure tool holder I’ve seen
reviews.reviewText: This is amazing! Holds 2 heavy, wet commercial mops and our brooms and nothing slips or slides. Plus we finally have hooks to hang damp cloths. Great tool holder!
